ygData.subject: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: On the skill cap issue, I know it used to exist if only for the number of people that would complain about no increases on this list.  That chatter has gone
ygData.messageBody:
On the skill cap issue, I know it used to exist if only for the number of
people that would complain about no increases on this list. That chatter
has gone away though, so...

I have a lvl 18 gnome that hasn't even trained or attempted one point in
tinkering, yet. I will set him tinkerin' until I don't see any more skill
increases and let the list know how far I get.

Its not that I don't believe you, Grundup the necro, I just want a second
opinion. :)

Wopr, gnome wizard
Bertoxxulous
